description: How will climate change affect the availability of water in the Western United Statesâ€”where water is already the most precious natural resource? What water management challenges does the Western U.S. face? How do we manage natural disasters like drought, wildfire, and flooding? This course engages participants with cutting-edge science in exploring these and other questions about the intersection of climate change and water management in the West.
title: Climate Science Connections: Water in the West
